title: 111_hr4684
content: National September 11 Memorial Museum Commemorative Medal Act of 2010 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and make available for sale not more than 2 million silver national medals, containing one ounce of silver each, in commemoration of the 10th anniversary of the September 11, 2001, terrorist attacks on the United States and the establishment of the National September 11 Memorial Museum at the World Trade Center. Declares that all sales of medals under this Act shall include a surcharge of $10 per medal, which shall be paid to the National September 11 Memorial Museum at the World Trade Center to support its operations and maintenance. Provides for compliance of the budgetary effects of this Act with the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010.
